property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone if you have 2 shields or less, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win until the start of your next turn. Revolution 0 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire command(When one of your fire commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have the highest power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 6 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, for each of your light commands in the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom of their deck. If that card costs 5 or more, return all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone to their owners' hand. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If all are creatures that have the same cost, put them into the battle zone. Otherwise, put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. If your opponent has 2 shields or less, your Water creatures can't be attacked or blocked.

card.name: Killer the Kill, Revolution Demon King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, put all non-evolution darkness creatures from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard your hand. Your opponent chooses and destroys one of his creatures for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire command(When one of your fire commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, choose a light, water, darkness, fire and nature card in your opponent's mana zone and tap them. Those cards don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. Invasion - Nature command(When one of your nature commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) While this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, if your opponent's creatures haven't attacked that turn, each of his creatures must attack it if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: World breaker(This creature breaks all your opponent's shields) This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. If you have 6 or less nature cards in your mana zone, this creature doesn't untap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Invasion - Light Command(When one of your light commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When this creature would be destroyed, you may put a creature from your hand under this creature instead. While there are 3 or more cards under this creature, this creature doesn't leave the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Your light creatures that cost 6 or less win all battles. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by a spell effect, they can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your water creatures in the battle zone. Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck and then put it on the bottom of their deck. If it costs 5 or more, untap this creature after the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. Invasion - Darkness command(When one of your darkness commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) This creature attacks each turn if able. Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 13 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Quattro breaker(This creature breaks 4 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Fire Bird, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. Each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than this creature and put it in it's owners mana zone. Revolution 2 - While you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +9000 power and 'quattro breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then that player shuffles their deck and reveals the top card. If it's a creature, that player may put it in the battle zone for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and 'blocker' until the start of your next turn,.

card.name: La Kulstar, Ball of Heaven Stars

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top card of your deck and put it on the bottom of your deck. If it was a Light creature, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked. When this creature is destroyed, return it from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use a card that has 'shield trigger' from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck, and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If that card costs 5 or more, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Saver(When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead) When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. During your turn, you may summon darkness evolution creatures from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a darkness creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power attacker +2000(While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power) If your opponent has 2 shields or less, each of your fire creatures gets 'speed attacker'.(A creatures that has 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck and choose a fire creature from among them. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has the same as or less power than that creature. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. Invasion - Nature command(When one of your nature commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) You may summon this creature from your mana zone. At the end of your turn, put this creature into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Guardman(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap it. Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this creature if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Saver(When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead) When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your nature creatures that have power 6000 or more cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Invasion - Light creature(When one of your light creatures attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other light creatures gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have 3 or more light creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power and the Angel Command race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Saver(When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead) When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, if your opponent has 2 shields or less, untap all your light creatures.

property.name: Rules

property.value: Evolution - Put on one of you water creatures. Invasion - Water Invaders or Water Liquid People(When one of your water invaders or water liquid people attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked by non-commands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature or one of your other water creatures would be destroyed, if your opponent has 2 shields or less, put that creature into your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card other than the first draw you draw that turn, this creature gets +2000 power and the Magic Command race until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent's spells cost 2 more to cast.

property.value: You may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, draw the same number of cards. Charger(After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Guardman(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead) This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose another one of your other creatures. That creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.value: Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more nature cards in your mana zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may take a creature from among them and show it to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
